article_text:
Mineral Wells, TX (76067)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms developing during the afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High around 85F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. Low 68F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author:
DAVID MAY
editor@mineralwellsindex.com

og.description: A number of rural hospitals across the U.S. were on life support until finally having to pull the plug and close.
og.title: PPGH: Not close to closing
